results.name: Expansion of (1+x)^2/((1 + x + x^2)*(1 + x - x^2)).
comment: Diagonal sums of the Riordan array ((1+x)/(1+x+x^2), x/(1+x)), A106509.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,-1,0,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x)^2/((1 + x + x^2)(1 + x - x^2)), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 12 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,0,0,0]; [n le 4 select I[n] else -2*Self(n-1)-Self(n-2)+Self(n-4): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 12 2014
def A005252(n): return sum( binomial(n-2*k, 2*k) for k in (0..n//4) )
[A106511(n) for n in (0..45)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 29 2021
